question: Which companies have executed deals with analytics vendors and what technology do they utilize in their operations?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have executed deals with analytics vendors from the CompanyDealMaster table. [CompanyDealMaster]
Gather details about the technologies used by these companies from the CompanyVendorTechDetail table. [CompanyVendorTechDetail]
Analyze the tech stack of these companies from the CompanyTechStack table. [CompanyTechStack]
Combine the data to identify the technologies utilized by companies with analytics vendor deals. [CompanyDealMaster, CompanyVendorTechDetail, CompanyTechStack]
